DESCRIPTION
Promasidor is an African beverage and food-products powerhouse that caters to 850-million people. Motivated, dynamic and progressive, Promasidor is a shining example of exactly how much can be achieved on this great continent.

Promasidor was founded in 1979 by Robert Rose, who left the United Kingdom in 1957 for Zimbabwe to pursue his African dream. As Chairman of Allied Lyons Africa for over 20 years, he travelled extensively across Africa and gained a unique and thorough knowledge of the food industry throughout the continent. In particular he noticed a lack of availability of the one highly nutritious product that the developed world takes for granted - milk.

DESCRIPTION
Established in 1722, Sigma Paints is recognized as one of the leading forces in the Decorative, Marine and Protective market segment in the Middle East's paints and coatings industry. Maintaining a heritage of commitment to quality and endless innovation, today we are a reference point in paints and are viewed as the favored coating company in the Middle East.

We were founded in Dammam in 1981 by a consortium of eminent Saudi businessmen in cooperation with SigmaKalon. Sigmakalon was the second largest coatings manufacturer in Europe employing over 12,000 people across 50 countries with an annual turnover of US$2.8 billion. In January 2008, PPG Industries (NYSE: PPG), a US based global supplier of coatings, chemicals, glass and fiber glass and equity affiliates and operating in more than 60 countries worldwide, acquired SigmaKalon. PPG Industries has an annual turnover of US$14 billion.

column597:
DESCRIPTION
The country is still rebuilding after a devastating genocide in 1994 left over one million people dead. While Rwanda is now a peaceful country, the trauma of the genocide of the Tutsi people remains.

Despite economic progress, poverty remains widespread. Most people in Rwanda rely on farming to make a living. But climate change means they have to adapt how they farm.

Trócaire began working in Rwanda during the genocide. We have stayed ever since.


With your support, Trócaire is helping to build a brighter future for people in Rwanda. We help people earn better incomes and grow more food. We help women, men and young people become more resilient. We also help people overcome trauma and build a future of peace and hope.

column731:
DESCRIPTION
Housing Bank of Rwanda (HBR), also known as Rwanda Housing Bank, is a commercial bank in Rwanda. Its name in French is Banque de l'Habitat du Rwanda SA (BHR). The bank is one of the commercial banks licensed by the National Bank of Rwanda, the national banking regulator. History The bank was opened in 1975, as a housing finance institution as well as a real estate developer. HBR was registered as a limited liability company. On 2nd July 2004, the National Bank of Rwanda, the country's Central Bank, granted HBR a Provisional License to operate as a Housing Bank. The license was contingent upon the institution raising its share capital to the minimum of US$2.65 million dollars, to comply with then current banking laws in Rwanda. On 25th February 2005, the shareholders of Banque de l'Habiatat du Rwanda (BHR), held an Extra Ordinary General Meeting and decided to increase their share capital to the required minimum, to change their name to Housing Bank of Rwanda and to change their mission from a mortgage company/real estate developer to a Commercial Bank that specializes in Housing Finance.

DESCRIPTION
BEBE DECOR LTD is a company which deals with decoration in babies'room as well as the sewing of curtains,table mats,bed covers, kitchen apron together with mittens and babies' items.
Babies'items include cradle outline,Moses basket, Feeding pillow,sleeping bag,cosmetic basket, baby bag, basket for both ironed and unironed clothes ,bed covers and bed sheets.

The sewed table mats are made of African tissues. The whole set contains one table cloth,8 napkins,6 under-dishes,8 under-plates and a bread basket.They really look nice and can be got at an affordable price. The company also sews kitchen apron and mittens from kitenge tissues(Igitenge).Bed covers,bed sheets and curtains are also sewed with different designs.


Moreover,Bebe Decor Ltd offers some extra services like fixing the sewed curtains in the house,decorating babies'room using different kinds of stickers and installing all babies'items stated above so that the room looks really stunning.

So, all these products are available and can be got at an affordable price.If you want to decorate either your room or your baby's room, never hesitate to contact us. Your house needs to look beautiful and attractive.All you need to do is just calling us and then we fix everything for you.

column60:
DESCRIPTION
Quantum Trading link Rwandan local farmers to International buyers in the trade of agricultural commodities.

Indeed, Rwanda is home to some of the best commodities that are attractive to international buyers. These include coffee, horticulture products such as flowers, organic fruits and vegetables. However, a number of local farmers do not have the required capacity to trade on international markets nor the know how to comply with international standards.


Quantum Trading aims to bridge this gap by linking local farmers to international buyers and facilitating the standards and quality challenges, as well as the sampling and export process.

Ranging from indoor team building events invlolving highly engaging and motivational activities as a standalone event, to those combined with a conferences or meetings to 'break the ice.' Our outdoor events - including retreats, adventure safaris - provide a picturisque and exhilarating effect to a corporate team building event.


Whether you are an active group that would enjoy exhilarating outdoor team building events or woud prefer one of our more relaxed team building events, our selection suits all group types.

DESCRIPTION
This depends on the quantity to be printed, the dimensions of the paper sheet, the print quality needed, whether the job involves color printing, and the date it must be finished. The Copy Centers print black toner on 11x17-inch or smaller paper, with 24-hour, or less, turnaround the norm. Printing Services produces black-and-white and color documents in larger quantities on paper sizes that can exceed 11x17 inches; that may need editorial services; that use halftones or need precise registration; and that allow for longer turnaround time.

Please contact us before you begin your printing project!

We can guide you through the process from start to finish, saving you time and money. We are your one-stop shop when it comes to all your printing needs, helping you do MORE with LESS!

DESCRIPTION
“your one-step stop event rental company”

Swiss event rentals is active in the field of furniture, decoration, AV equipment rentals as well as in logistics, construction and other event services. With headquarters in Switzerland and an office in Rwanda, we are active throughout Switzerland and Rwanda as well as in most of the neighbouring countries.

Our team of professionals is at your disposal at all times and looks forward to answering your questions and guiding you in the realization and beautification of your event.

Thanks to our wide range of products and services, our large storage area and our own fleet of vehicles, we are able to respond quickly and flexibly to all types of requests for your activities and event projects.


Our philosophy: making your event unique, going that extra mile that makes all the difference.

• Furniture rental and space planning

column134:
DESCRIPTION
ViaVia Kigali has opened its doors for you and we can’t wait to welcome you!

We have for you: 6 nicely decorated rooms, all with ensuite bathroom (hot water is provided by our solar panels), a cosy eating area, a welcoming reception and 3 (!) gardens to chill in... A healthy breakfast is included in the price.


In the restaurant, we serve food from all over the world. Guacamole or chili con carne from South-Africa, Rwandan porc stew, Asian curries and of course Belgian fries!

We are located in a quiet area of town, Kibagabaga, on a stone’s throw from the ever-vibrant Kimironko Market. The airport is only 15 away.

Murakaza neza!

Welcome!

DESCRIPTION
Albertine Tours is a tours and travel agency offering budget safaris in Rwanda, Uganda, Congo and Burundi. Our name is aligned to western branch of the East African Rift Valley. We are Rwanda’s foremost inbound tour operator specialized in organising adventures in Rwanda. Our offers include gorilla trekking safaris, chimpanzee tracking, game viewing and cultural holidays in the Africa’s Albertine Rift region covering parts of Rwanda and southwestern Uganda.

We offer an all-inclusive package holiday in order to have soft adventure and cultural travel of a lifetime. Our package holiday includes equipment and clothing for soft adventure, ground transportation, meals and accommodation that match someone’s choice.

DESCRIPTION
We are here to vouch your structure with transforming our clients 'cogitation into reality, through the use of innovative, creative and practical design solutions.
WVS LTD is a Construction Company that provides construction consultancies, Architecture services, Planning, Engineering Design, and Management of General construction and Interior Design Projects. WVS LTD was established in Kigali, Rwanda, in the year 2015.

We have a broad portfolio of successfully completed projects across a range of sectors including Residential, Restoration / Refurbishment, Hospitality, Commercial... We have built our reputation on our client focus and hands-on approach. We are proud of the fact that the majority of our workload comes from repeat business and that we have a strong reputation for our competitive edge and reliable execution of all projects undertaken. This is achieved through our relentless attention to detail and an experienced team with the drive and customer focus to ensure client satisfaction is a given on all WVS LTD projects.

We continue to invest in modern business practices and management techniques in order to ensure that we remain at the cutting edge of our industry. We continue to build on our reputation with our focus firmly on growing the ability of the business to deliver in new and innovative ways. Our ambition and goals for years have always been to deliver quality projects and value for money to our clients; our success and reputation today have been testament to this wisdom.

column324:
DESCRIPTION
Ikaze, Rwanda Tours & Travel Services Ltd is a local owned and operated tour and travel company, legally registered in Rwanda. The company’s establishment derived from a long time dream from its owner, to run a fully-fledged tourism business entity to employ himself, while also availing employment opportunities to many other fellow citizens, after realizing a high rate of unemployment prevailing in the local society, especially among youth; who in most cases, after completing their studies, struggle to secure stable paying jobs, already scarce on the market. The owner was as well motivated by his own industry experience, having been in tourism and hospitality industry for over five years, working as an office coordinator in a private tour firm, hotel receptionist, destination tour guide and later, destination specialist involved in tour planning and execution.
We offer responsible, life-changing tour and travel services that spark travel emotions of our global esteemed customers, support to our dear communities and full respect to our environment. Our offering portfolio extends well over Remarkable Rwanda to include some of the East Africa’s finest tourist destinations such as Masai Mara game reserve in Kenya and Serengeti National park in Tanzania.

K-Tech was founded in mid 2016 , as Information Technology company focusing on information security, cyber security at large, software development, web application development, consultancy IT Services and we provide technical advices. “Kataza” is the Kinyarwanda word having meaning of "move fast or/and move forward" along the improvement of business processes within considering information security leading to a certain goal and success of the x-company by using latest ICT tools as enablers. We value our clients.

No matter how big is the solution a client is looking for, K-Tech signed a partnership agreement with foreign company “B-Infosec” that has office in Manama, Bahrain from which this gathered expertise from both parties with experienced engineers will help serving you better at the highest level with latest security technologies available on the market.


At K-Tech, we also focus on software, website and web application development, ICT Policy and Strategy, Data Management, Systems Audits, E-Business Strategy, ICT Project Management and Design with considering security in mind while on the internet and/ or offline as well. We help you to protect all of your network infrastructure, installed systems, everything that may be compromised by attackers.

DESCRIPTION
SOFARU HARDWARE is one of the top hardware shops in Kigali with 30 years of experience in construction, electrical, and Plumbing Materials & Wall Master.

Established by a Rwandan businessman and entrepreneur Edouard Ruterana, who doubles as its Managing Director, SOFARU started as a small hardware shop in 1991 but it has since grown to become one of the largest hardware stores in Kigali, serving the entire country.


With its main retail shop located at Muhima, Nyarugenge District, in Kigali City, SOFARU is known across the country for quality construction, electric cables, tiles, water equipment, and high-quality finishing colours for both residential and commercial buildings.

CCOAIB “Conseil de Concertation des Organisations d’Appui aux Initiatives de Base” is a Rwandan organization holding a legal personnality published under the ministerial order n°103/11 du 07/09/2004. Created in 1987 by 12 organizations to the grassroots initiatives, the group CCOAIB kept on growing, actually, it now counts 42 effective members. These members lead their actions in the whole national territory and affecte various development domains working mostly in agriculture and animal husbandry, apiculture, food-processing transformation, habitat, crafts industry, livestock loan, female entrepreneurship, rural hydraulic, water and draining, youth supervisory , orphans supervisory, cooperatives supervisory , the micro-finance, self -promotion support of the rural environernent, appropriated technology .

DESCRIPTION
NPD Ltd. is Rwanda’s premier civil engineering and Construction Company, delivering practical solutions to diverse clients.

Established in 1996, NPD COTRACO Ltd was the result of a merger between two entities, COTRACO s.a.r.l. and Nyarutarama Property Developers (NPD) s.a.r.l. Prior to the merger, COTRACO focused solely on the provision of prefabricated concrete products. NPD Ltd was established in 1996 as a Kigali based property developer specializing in the development of housing estates. The combined expertise of these organizations has granted NPD Ltd. a profound understanding of civil engineering works and geographically specific needs. Our extensive experience and myriad client solutions leave us uniquely positioned to become the foremost civil engineering and construction company in the region.

DESCRIPTION
beed is a management consulting and financial advisory service company based in Kathmandu, Nepal that is operating on assignment basis in Kigali, Rwanda. The strength of this eco-system is in its people, also referred to as beeds, who are fiercely passionate individuals and believe in adopting ethical practices to achieve the next level. The three co-founders have over 50 years of experience between them and strive to take the “solution focus” approach while maintaining a high degree of integrity. beed has been sought after for internship and short term opportunities who are in pursuit of academic degrees in prestigious institutions around the world.
column563:
DESCRIPTION
Best Car Hire Uganda is Uganda’s premier 4×4 car rental service. We take pride in providing simple, high-quality, and safe car rental services around the country, having over 5 years of experience in the car hire and transportation industry. Our team has a lot of experience arranging self-guided holiday itineraries to numerous vacation destinations, and we’re always happy to help. For your next trip, make a reservation with us.

Our car rental inventory consists of family vehicles, SUVs, 4WD cars, trucks, passenger vans, and minibuses with seating capacities ranging from 15 to 44 passengers, all of which are well maintained and serviced.

Despite the absence of paved roads in Uganda, our well-kept 4×4 vehicles will readily carry you on an adventure parked drive.


Our cars for hire have unlimited mileage and we provide discounts to travelers/guests who rent the cars for seven days or longer. We also provide complimentary airport pick-up and drop-off to our visitors.

Do you want to go on a self-drive safari? Allow us to assist you in planning the ideal safari in Uganda, Africa’s Pearl. Allow us to obtain all of the necessary information, including gorilla permits, national park passes, and hotel reservations

DESCRIPTION
The International Network for Natural Sciences (INNSPUB) is working as an international professional and independent scientific publisher which is dedicated to publish scholarly research article and books. INNSPUB believe in sharing of new scientific knowledge and ideas in the field of natural sciences, biology, agriculture and medicine all over the world. All our publications are available online that concurrently belong to many societies, universities and research institutes.

INNSPUB publishes approximately five scholarly peer-reviewed scientific journals. Online manuscript submission, web-based peer review system, web-based editorial management system and subscriber’s management system, are helpful for us in develop services provide to the scientific communities.
Unique features
● Fast-track peer-reviewed by international experts
● Fast publication and Continious
● Open access for facilitating higher number of citations
● Covered by renowned abstracting and indexing services

● All IJB articles are assigned to CrossRef DOI number

column732:
DESCRIPTION
With unflinching passion for excellence, it is our Endeavour to emerge as one of the world’s major software resources.

Bitcom Network Services offers a full suite of IT solutions and services, including Web Hosting Services, Software Development Services, Outsourcing Services, IT Consultancy Services and Graphic Designing Services.

We have delivered path-breaking solutions in key verticals such as travel, autos, medical, education and construction.

We Value Our Clients:
Bitcom actively collaborates with clients to create something valuable for them.
We strive to make a positive and lasting business impact by going beyond a client-vendor relationship and becoming an extended part of our customers’ enterprise.

No wonder then that a large percentage of our revenues comes from repeat business.

We Have Experience:
Bitcom is proud to have served hundreds of clients worldwide.
Our extensive exposure with vast array of business makes us understands any new client’s requirements easily.

We are Quality Conscious:
Attempting to provide world-class services, we always strive to provide you with quality work and consider “every effort counts”. Excellent and consistent quality at low cost is what drives our business.

Timely Delivery:
Timely delivery without compromising on quality; we value time as a major factor in measuring the success or failure of a product or service.

Documented Approach:
Every task is driven by a documented process at Bitcom.
Our clients experience a more organized flow of business communication and development of a solution.

Flexibility:
We consider the accomplishment of a project only after we find our client using it and benefiting from it.
And we never mind going an extra mile for the sake of this accomplishment.

column21: COMPANY MANAGER Mr. CYIZA IZERE Gerardson
column22:
DESCRIPTION
We are leading suppliers of specialized furniture for Hospitals, clinics and medical institutions.
Our products include, hospital beds (both electrical and manual), bedside cabinets, overbed tables, stretchers, trolleys, stainless steel products for operation rooms and furniture for hospital lobies, waiting rooms and hospital personnel offices.


We offer quality products at very competitve prices and we always deliver on time.

Please contact us with your inquiries and we shall be delighted to answer your requirements.

We supply a full range of packaging machines suitable for packing any type of products in pouches, bottles, cups or containers for any type of liquid, powder, granules, paste or solids.

We provide turnkey projects, machines, and spares suitable for industries of beverages, dairies, snacks, bakeries, pharmaceuticals, cosmetics, detergent, confectionaries, tea, coffee, etc.

We also supply ingredients used in the food and beverage industries.

Some of the Machines and Spares that we supply include;
• All types of water treatment Plants like RO Plants, D.M Plants, Softeners, etc.

• All types of Sachet / Pouch Packaging Machines for any granule, powder or liquid.
• Vacuum Packaging Machines.
• Shrink Wrapping / Packaging Machines, L Sealers, etc.
• Strapping Machines, Carton Sealers, etc.
• Continuous Band Sealers, Induction Sealers, Hand Sealers, Foot Sealers, etc.
• Batch / Date Coding Machines, Inkjet Printers, Labeling Machines, etc.

• Pet Blow Moulding Machines.

• Ozone and Oxygen generators, Filter Press, etc.
• Chemicals for Boilers, Cooling Towers, Water Treatment Plants, etc.

• Material Handling Equipment’s like Pallet Lifts, Stackers, Trolleys, Conveyors, etc.
• And Many More.

Some of the food Ingredients and Additives that we can supply include;
• Natural Menthol Crystals, Eucalyptus Oil, Peppermint, Spearmint, etc.
• All types of Natural and Synthetic Food Flavors.
• Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, etc.

• CMC, Xanthan Gum, Guar Gum, etc.
• Caramel and all other food-grade Colours in Powder and Liquid form.
• And Many More.

Some of the Consultancy Services that we provide include;
• Set up projects from the concept to commissioning.

• Others of Clients Customized Requirements.

column127:
DESCRIPTION
We are dedicated to providing quality legal services to individuals and businesses alike.

Our team of experienced attorneys is here to help you navigate the complexities of the legal system and achieve your desired outcomes.

Our law firm specializes in several practice areas, including personal injury, family law, criminal defense, immigration, and business law. We take pride in our ability to provide comprehensive legal solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of our clients.

At our law firm, we understand that facing legal issues can be stressful and overwhelming. That is why we are committed to providing personalized attention and compassionate guidance to help you achieve the best possible outcome. We believe that effective communication is key to building strong relationships with our clients and keeping them informed throughout the legal process.

Our attorneys have extensive experience representing clients in both state and federal courts. We are dedicated to providing aggressive advocacy and achieving the best possible results for our clients.


Whether you are facing criminal charges, seeking compensation for a personal injury, or need help navigating a family law matter, our team is here to help.

We also understand the importance of affordability when it comes to legal services. That is why we offer flexible payment options and reasonable rates to ensure that everyone has access to quality legal representation.


If you are looking for a law firm that will provide effective legal representation, compassionate guidance, and personalized attention, look no further than our law firm.

TOPSEC is your complete source for Security Guards, CCTV, IP Camera, Video Door Phones, Access Control, Intruder / Fire Alarm Systems,. Through our strategic partnerships with world class manufacturers, we have constructed the most comprehensive catalogue of digital surveillance equipment and other security related products available to dealers and security professionals in the South Africa, UK, USA

Our philosophy is simple. We listen to our customers and then offer unbiased honest professional advice. We are continuously investing great deal of time and attendance . This allows us to be very selective in the brands and products that we carry. We do not follow industry trends, but rather set them. We embrace products that are field tested and include a manufacturers warranty. We also warn our customers to be aware of the self proclaimed Security Manufacturer who is simply importing no-name cameras and products from overseas that include no warranty or support.


Our Technical products are available through a network of approved dealers throughout UK, Europe and now the Middle East and Africa.

column140:
DESCRIPTION
Eco-protection Ltd is a Rwandese company working with Eloy water, a Belgian company specialized in designing and building of products for runoff water and wastewater treatment plants. Eco-Protection represents exclusively Eloy Water in Rwanda, and shares the same view as its « parent company » where team spirit, seriousness and professional work are major quality of a liable company. Eco-Protection offers advanced biological treatment systems and use the Technologies of “Sequential Batch Reactor” (S.B.R) and “Aerated Submerged film” which allow adaptive solutions to a variety of effluents and the discharge standards required by their receiving environments. Eco-Protection is not only proud to provide a « quality product », but also investing in Rwanda by supplying and monitoring regularly its sewerage system and offering a fast repair as necessary. Since 2007, Eco-Protection has successfully provided more than 95 operational domestic wastewater treatment plants and is currently working on others.

nutrition which boosts our health, as well as dealing in research services and consultancy in
matters relating to food and nutrition, food security, food production and processing. Research and development for new food products. We also provide a variety of trainings and
conferences on food and nutrition for the betterment of the critical mass to build healthy

Nations. We also deal in coffee that provides the healthier foods and drinks.
Food Nutrihealth management Ltd does not only focus at national level but also on the
international level, partnering with other international food and nutrition companies for the
provision of services and products for our esteemed customers.

Food NutriHealth Management Ltd has got a variety of expertise in the following areas:
1. Food production
2. Food processing
3. Post-harvest handling
4. Food packaging and canning
5. Food safety management
6. Research in food product development for nutrition and health values
7. Food product development
8. Consultancy, Research and trainings in all the above areas

DESCRIPTION
Universal Ventures Rwanda is a Travel and Tourism company, headquartered in Kigali Rwanda. We are specialists in tour planning, safaris and car rentals. For years now, we’ve been delivering our services across East Africa and have created a track record of surpassing our client’s expectations.

At the heart of our core values is altruism — this is why we are doing this — this is what drives us to keep going. Its our joy to serve you and hope that you have an amazing experience with us. We believe if you are happy, so will be your circle. This is our own way of trying to make the world better together.


Each year thousands of tourists who opt for African safari step into another world. Tourists experience the Great wildlife Safari adventure in Rwanda, they enter the world where rules are created by nature; There are different kinds of safaris available and tourists have a lot of options to choose from such as Mountain Gorilla Treks in Volcanoes National Park, Primates Safaris in Nyungwe Forest and Wildlife encounters in Akagera national Park.

The law firm is comprised of the finest and leading Attorneys/Advocates/Lawyers and the law firm has a long and successful track record of offering high-quality legal services to a wide range of clients including individuals with an overwhelming focus on business entities. ABAYO & CO. ADVOCATES discharges superb professionalism within the legal fraternity with well well-seasoned Advocates from diverse backgrounds and with comprehensive Legal expertise. The Firm has demonstrated to be an experienced team of Advocates and Legal professionals well known for providing quality legal services. ABAYO & CO. ADVOCATES offers a wide range of legal services covering different law domains dominated by administrative and public law, company law, commercial law, mergers and acquisitions, tax law, labor law, criminal law. In all domains, the following may attract the attention of your institution: Litigation & Alternative Dispute Resolution, Legal Advisory & Consultancy, Property & Technology, Real Estate, Infrastructure & Energy, Corporate – Banking & Commercial transactions, as well as Notary Services and also national, regional, and international clients and complies with regulations of the Rwanda Bar Association and East African Law Society. Expat For Africa Ltd Services is a Africa Real Estate company specializing mainly in Properties for sale, rent and lease. We are among the leading property agents in Africa offering mainly commercial, residential, agricultural and industrial property. We are a Real Estate brokerage and Real estate Consulting that helps local and foreign real estate investors to acquire their dream properties every where in Africa

Our clients recognized the need for reliable property management and they were pleased to find a company that would treat their property and their tenants like their own. Built on a basis of trust, integrity and dedication, Expat For Africa Services is a full service real estate company with dozens of estate agents all over Uganda. We cater for the needs of local and foreign investors in Real Estate in Africa As one of Real estate agents in Africa, we are committed to working in unison with clients’ vision and needs to formulate strategies, deliver unparalleled service, and always provide reliable, comprehensive information and analysis to help them take the best decisions while investing in all countries of Africa

Expat For Africa Services is among Africa’s urban, peri-urban and rural listing real estate service provider. Our Africa property network specializes in land for sale in Africa which includes; – Industrial land, – Residential land, – Farmland, ranches, – Land on Lake Kivu property, – Waterfront properties – Water front homes, – Land for Country homes, – Residential homes in Kigali and the surrounding areas With us, you are only a few days/weeks away from locating the right dream property in Africa. In case you are looking for one of the reliable Real Estate Agencies in Africa, contact Expat For Africa Services for quality and professional real estate services.

Expat For Africa Services’s scope of operation is in investment properties for sale and rent in Africa mainly in cities of Africa. We are your reliable development partner for all Africa Real Estate matters. Our property undertakings encompass a full range of real estate in Africa. From locating of suitable land or property for industrial or commercial development through leasing, purchasing or renting.

Our operations also encompass the management of the properties along with all associated tasks, as well as the optimization of the comprehensive property portfolio. We consider ourselves as a knowledgeable, dependable and translucent advisers, partners and Africa real estate service providers who helps the company’s service units to achieve their targets of satisfying customer needs.


Expat For Africa Services is a Africa Real Estate company specializing mainly in Investment properties. Expat For Africa Services opened its doors as a Africa Real Estate brokerage, Real estate consulting and Property Management company principally to represent investors’ interests in commercial real estate. Our clients recognized the need for reliable property management and they were pleased to find a company that would treat their property and their tenants like their own.

Built on a basis of trust, integrity and dedication, Expat For Africa Services is a full service real estate company with dozens of estate agents all over Africa, We cater for the needs of local and foreign investors in Real Estate in Africa.

At Expat For Africa Services, we are committed to working in unison with our clients’ vision and needs to formulate strategies, deliver unparalleled service, and always provide reliable, comprehensive information and analysis to help them take the best decisions while investing in Uganda. column317:
DESCRIPTION
About Farmfresh
FarmFresh is an innovative Kigali-based food processing company back by international impact investor that markets branded, fully-cooked Rwanda beans in laminated pouches aimed at retail consumers and institutions across East Africa. We have a large, modern production facility on the Kigali Special Economic Zone which is regulated by the Rwanda Food and Drug Authority (RFDA) and all our products carry the “S” Mark issued by the Rwanda Standards Board (RSB).
About the Product
We cook the beans in water and a little salt; no other ingredients. The product has a shelf life of 12 months. Simply open the pouch, pour the beans and their sauce into a pan and warm through. The taste of Rwandan beans ready in a fraction of the time and with much greater convenience. The attached product flyer gives you more information.

About the Benefits
There are multiple benefits that schools would benefit from by switching to the FarmFresh beans:

Cash savings. Having trialled our product with several schools and organisations, we believe you can save money by switching to the FarmFresh fully cooked beans, when accounting for the full costs of purchasing dry beans, salt, water and, most importantly, firewood, charcoal or LPG – the prices of which are all increasing. We can unlock these cost-savings as our central cooking process uses a fraction of the energy needed to cook beans from dry in your kitchens.
Convenience. Buying, cleaning and cooking beans is time consuming. The FarmFresh product is highly convenient, freeing your kitchen staff to become more efficient and reducing wastage while ensuring the highest standards of catering for your pupils. We will deliver the bean pouches directly to your school, at a frequency as agreed with your procurement team.

Environmental impact. When you warm the FarmFresh beans rather than cook dry beans from dry, you use less energy and so reduce greenhouse gas emissions.

Nutritional standards. The product works to the highest food production standards as set by the Rwanda pFDA and RSB. The vulnerable people you feed will benefit from these quality standards. Cooking the beans in our centralised facility, we check the standard of the beans (e.g. aflatoxin free) and can improve the nutritional standards, for example by using iodized salt as recommended by the Ministry of Health.

column341:
DESCRIPTION
MRB ATTORNEYS is one of the biggest and most reputable Law Firms in Rwanda regarded highly for the hands-on experience of its partners, professional service and continued client commitment. The partners are former Managing Partners or Partners of; Fountain Law Chambers (established in 2008), Kigali Allied Advocates (established in 2006), MK Law Office (established in 2009) and Prolex Advocates and Legal Consultants. The Partners therefore have long experience in legal practice and academia spanning several years. They have worked as advocates, state attorneys, consultants and advisors for government, intergovernmental agencies, international organizations, companies, banks and other corporate clientele in and outside Rwanda. They have each in their own capacity argued several cases before local courts right from the lower courts, to the Supreme Court, as well as, in the regional courts. In addition, most of them possess advanced degrees in law (LL.M). They have considerable skills, work experience as well as excellent local and international experience and contacts. The firm has senior associates and associates.
The firm is divided into five specialized departments. Each of the department is headed by a partner who works with other associates and legal officers to help in expediting and achieving on various assignments for the firm.

Rwanda Gorilla Safaris is one of the speciality tour operators based in Kigali Rwanda. We offer gorilla safaris to Rwanda, Uganda and the Democratic Republic of Congo. Since 2001, we have been offering excellent tour packages at the best prices on the market! Among our safari packages include mountain gorilla trekking in Bwindi and Volcanoes National Parks (Uganda and Rwanda), Wild chimpanzee tracking, Wildlife safaris, Birding safaris, culture / community tours, mountain hiking adventures among others. We offer memorable gorilla safaris and wildlife package to business travelers, holiday makers, Honeymooners, Photographers, Researchers, families, groups and students among others.

Zeno filling machine owns sets of production packaging machinery for pharmaceutical, honey, daily chemical,food, veterinary drugs, pesticides and lubricants.Meanwhile, we sell a variety of stand-alone equipment, such as powder filling machine,auger filling machine,liquid filling machine,milk powder filling line,labeling and sealing machines , powder, particle,paste (liquid) ration filling machines, strapping machines, vacuum (inflatable) sealing machines, cap screwing machine and customized packaging machines.Zeno's mission is to keep developing intelligent packaging machines and offer full packaging solutions for our customer. column540:
DESCRIPTION
ALLPARAMETERS LIMITED is a translation company. In the literal meaning of translation, we bring across the message from one language to the other. In the figurative sense, we unite cultures in the form of words to erase the language barriers between them. Our vision is simple, to see two different language users understand each other. The key to communication is simplicity. And that is our aim, not to be plain, not to be dull but to be able to find the simple, right words that can be appreciated by the reader. This is what our translators are hired and trained for: the balancing act of translating words that are both simple and attractive to the reader without losing the original meaning of the text. There are two ways to translating, the source text and the target text. We move from one world to the other, between the origin and the destination. As we are a professional translation company, we put our mindset in the source text to be able to understand it and shift it to the mindset of the target text that they would be able to understand it in their own language. That is the humble offering of our translation services.

column669:
DESCRIPTION
IWACU STUDIO was created as a result of professionals from different fields identifying the need for Rwandan companies to extend their brands, reach beyond the conventional boundaries. Iwacu studio is a Rwandan based company providing various media and marketing services to businesses, government and private institutions and individuals. Our clientele includes Investors, International NGOs, Banks, Manufacturing companies, Small and Medium Enterprises, Schools, Churches, Parastatals, private and public corporate institutions. We provide graphic design, Photography and printing across the country. We do marketing tools and all sorts of branding. Iwacu studio is one of the few One-stop center for investors who want to create brand awareness and marketing materials that retain current clients and attract new customers. Custom logo designs are what provides your company a face, which means there can be no good branding without them. Your logo design helps you achieve your business goals, so it has to be original, that is where Iwacu studio begins.

Kigali Car Rentals is a fully independent car Rental Company offering discount car hire in Rwanda. We serve clients looking for both self drive and chauffeur driven car Hire in Rwanda and the whole of East Africa.

We have a staff which is ready to serve you. Kigali Car Rentals is owned and managed by Muzungu Frank who has vast experience in offering travel services in East Africa.


Kigali Car Rentals has continued the philosophies of the original owner and initiator of Self Drive Safaris in Rwanda focusing on providing great self drive car hire service, quality, and fair pricing. We help in planning affordable Road trips in Rwanda.

column1:
DESCRIPTION
NanoTranslate Rwanda Ltd is a word-refining group of highly experienced native translators and interpreters who work confidentially in tight collaboration on your project. This refinery is fully equipped to handle all kinds of international translation in over 100 languages. Whether you require an interpreter for just a few minutes, or the translation of a one-page legal document, technical paper or your company website, we have over 100 highly experienced and qualified linguists ( with area based technicians)who can work in tight collaboration to produce your well-refined translation on time.

NanoTranslate Rwanda Ltd is a full-service interpretation, translation and Event Management home committed to delivering consistently quality at competitive prices. Our services are not limited to only Editing, Proofreading, Localization, Subtitling, Captioning, Transcription, Interpreting BUT ALSO managing your event from the beginning up to its end.

Since our founding in December, 2017, our regional and global networks have enabled us to work with linguistic and technical professionals who are able to demonstrate strong organizational skills and attention to detail; able to maintain scheduling requiremets; able to demonstrate strong writing and communication skills; able to demonstrate strong computer skills and familiarity with translation / Interpretation tools


Your translation or interpretation inquiry will be immediately effective upon our confirmation. Since then, we will start to work on your project in strong confidentiality. Your deadline will always be our shortest ever.

Linguistically Optimizing!

column10:
DESCRIPTION
LinguaCom Plus is a language and communication services company based in Rwanda, Kigali (KG 182 St, Martin Plaza, 3rd Floor) serving clients worldwide. Thanks to a strong online team, connected all the time, we serve clients in the four corners of the globe. We offer language professional services including
- Translation
- Interpretation
- Copywriting
- Editing and Proofreading
- Transcription and Subtitling
We offer these services in English, French, Italian, Kinyarwanda, Kirundi, Luganda, Portuguese and Swahili and we count to cover most African rare pairs.
We have a pool of professionals in languages, communications and media production backed by a large network of experts from the academia across the world. Individuals and organizations can work with us; seeking to buy our services, or as Independent Business Partners (IBPs) or again as In-bound Partner Relations Representatives (IPRRs) in their own countries and cities all over the world. When we partner with an organization seeking to buy our services, they have a "unique partner price package" which is a special discount to organizations that choose to partner with us for the services we offer.
All our language professionals are native speakers of the language they work into or have a native level in it. We are reputed of respecting deadlines and offering best quality work. Confidentiality for our clients is one of our core values we always stick to. Because LinguaCom Plus is owned by professionals on board, our prices are exceptionally affordable. As a client, you directly deal with the service provider and owner.

To inquire about anything or join our team write to us at info@linguacomplusgroup.com or visit our website to fill in online forms.

column31:
DESCRIPTION
AB NICOS provides the following services:

1. Fumigation
2. Pest control
3. Veterinary services
4. Dogs and Cats vaccination and therapy
5. Garden repair and maintenance
6. General cleaning
“We keep you First & Keep you Ahead”
*AB Nicos Ltd*| *Mobile: (+250) 788318764 / 0788312114 /0728803795 /0733547000
| *E-mail: infoabnicos@gmail.com

COMPANY INTRODUCTION

I. AB Nicos Ltd; we are a pest control company, which is specialized in protecting your property, before pests become a problem.

What Do We Do? Our pest control treatment and inspection services are performed while taking your satisfaction into account. We guarantee it. We involve you in the process and answer any questions you may have. Our goal is to exceed your expectations. We know that each situation is different. That’s why our pest control inspectors and exterminators assess the problem, and then meet you to discuss what needs to be done. There are no surprises later on. We give you the facts up front and customize a treatment program that works for you.

II. Our Commitment Our Quality Control Program is unparalleled in the industry. We make sure the service is done in the right way and we have the process and people in place to guarantee it. Our Performance Home Pest Control offers homeowners and businesses a full complement of pest control inspection and treatment service options, termite treatment programs (with non-confusing termite warranty options and no deductibles on damage claims), as well as repair and moisture control services. Also, we only use environmentally sensitive and registered products for all pest control solutions (accepted by Rwanda Standard Board “RSB”).


III. AB Nicos Ltd; is a leader in the pest control industry. Locally owned and operated, we have been serving Kigali homeowners, businesses and residential builders since 2012. We stand behind the pest control services with “The No-Pest Promise”. Our Experience Our pest control inspection team, technicians/exterminators are trained, certified, and knowledgeable in all facets of pest and termite control. In addition, our continuing education program insures you are getting well-informed, highly skilled professionals trained in the latest pest control treatment technology.
IV. Our Services Pest Control/Termite Control
•Repair leaky sinks and pipes.
•Check showers and baths for leaky plumbing.
•Check gutters and downspouts.
Make sure water runs away from your home and does not accumulate near the foundation.
V. Mosquito Treatment/Control
•Remove any standing water. Remove any object that can catch rainwater, including empty buckets, plastic containers, pot holes, etc.
•Replace the water in your birdbath or water garden frequently. While these lawn and garden fixtures provide pleasure for you and your feathered friends, they also can be a haven for mosquitoes.
•Turn unused wheelbarrows upside down.

VI. Our Services Termite Damage Warranty
•Foundation Sill Repair
•Sub Floor Repair
•Bathroom Floor Replacement (tile and vinyl) Ant Extermination
•Cleaning up crumbs and spills right away
•Making sure garbage bags are sealed and kept away from the home
•Keeping food packages closed after opening (Moisture Control •
Moisture Barriers •
Foundation Vents Flea Pest Control •Vacuum all rugs, carpets and furniture – especially between and under cushions. Then, seal and dispose of the vacuum bag in an outside receptacle. •Clear and clean all floors, even closets. Mop all tile and vinyl floors. Sweep all concrete floors
VII. Our Services Rodent Control
•The most reliable sign of an infestation is rodent droppings. You may find droppings where you store your food and especially pet food. Other common places are in cupboards, under the sink, along walls or on top of wall studs or beams. Storage rooms, sheds and barns with stored boxes or old furniture make great homes for rodents. •Rodents tend to build their nests from materials that are soft, fuzzy or warm; such as shredded paper, dry grass, fabric or furniture stuffing. The nests will be located in sheltered areas close to food and water. •Food boxes, containers or food itself that appears to be nibbled. Look for droppings nearby. Rodents can chew through plastic, so plastic bags do not make safe food storage containers.

Business Contact Information:
AB Nicos Ltd*| *Mobile: (+250) 788318764 / 0788312114 /0728803795 /0733547000
| *E-mail: infoabnicos@gmail.com

DESCRIPTION
The water and sanitation policy of the Government of Rwanda is since 2004 tuned at moving away from community based management and promoting participation of the private sector in the management of rural water service provision.
In RWANDA, the management of water facilities in rural areas is carried out directly by the private operators. In the spirit of good governance based on Public private partnership (PPP) in Rwanda, some experts and technicians of the former REGIE D’EAU in KIREHE District created AYATEKE STAR COMPANY Ltd with the aim of expanding activities to various areas in Rwanda and East Africa.

It was officially registered with “RWANDA DEVELOPMENT BOARD (RDB)” on 09 August 2013 with Company Code No 103058183.

DESCRIPTION
Primary Business Activity:
Specialist of Metal Racks, Shelves and Mezzanine Floor
Material handling equipment, storage tank, trollies, wood/metal furniture, electronics & industrial appliances.

Business Profile:
Kicom Ltd was established in 2013, since establishment, company mainly dealing in storage solution for warehouses. There are lot of warehouses coming up all over country and looking for a perfect storage solution, material handling, finished goods storage or any other purpose, the concept is developing and as a company we are looking at bright future in Rwanda.

Product Profile:

Metal Racks
The metal racks are made of mild steel with perforated column & beams for shelving, the heights ranges from 2 Meter to 8 meter with multilevel shelving and capacity form 1 ton to 5 tons. The racks gives well organize storage and easier management of stock.

Stacker Cranes (NEWLY ADDED)
Made of I-Section of various size with lift mechanism and controls

Mezzanine Floor
Mezzanine is unique solution for ware house, an additional floors of space for a variety of different uses such including storage or extra office space. It can be rack supported mezzanine or ideal floor. Made of metallic structure with hard wood or shutter ply flooring.

Shelving
The shelves are made of metal used for any businesses, factories, garages and stores with easy adjustability and mobility. Available in galvanize and mild steel with powder coated surface.

MK Associated Advocates is among the best law firms in Rwanda, established in 2017 with an objective of providing legal services to both national and international clients. It is situated in Remera-Kigali-Rwanda, on African Union Road, KN3RD Kicukiro, KK 192 ST Remera at Gashumba House on the 1st floor opposite Prince House.

Our clients benefit from our experience in core areas such as commercial, environmental, labour and employment, real estate conveyance and construction, Insurance, Reinsurance and Insurance Recovery, Banking and Finance, Cross Border, Customs and International transactions, Legal Consultancy & Research Development, Immigration and tax. The lawyers in our Energy, Environment and Natural Resources Practice assist clients to achieve their business objectives in a range of regulatory, litigation, legislative and transactional matters at the intersection of law, business, science and public policy. Our clients range from established industry leaders to emerging companies that reflect Rwanda's status as one of the premier technology and commercial centres in Rwanda and East African region.

column88:
DESCRIPTION
Hooza is a Digital Media house registered at the Rwanda Development Board (RDB) and a certified media outlet registered at the Rwanda Media Commission (RMC), based in Kigali Rwanda and working in the field of digital broadcast and business consultancy in Central and East Africa.
We broadcast daily multimedia short programs on demand to mobile users in Central and East Africa.

Hooza also supports African Governments through its Mobile Governance service that enables a 2 ways communication channel between non-profit, private and public institutions and the population using audio Interactive Voice Response technology for mobile phones. The Mobile Governance tools is mainly use for mass dissemination of health awareness campaign, polls and surveys, mobile earning, civic education campaigns, disaster and weather alerts and public service announcements. Our suite of mobile solution has been used by the National Electoral Commission in Rwanda for its Civic Education campaign in the 2017 presidential elections, attracting more that 400,000 unique users.


As a Business Consultancy firm, Hooza has an expertise in management consultancy, entrepreneurship mentoring, training and coaching. We train young entrepreneurs to build their business and source for funding through incubation hubs and accelerators program with a focus on women empowerment and social and economic development in rural areas. Hooza maintain support and assistance and insure projects sustainability. Some of our mentees were awarded in the Rwanda Development Board Awards in 2017; the Tony Elumelu Foundation Entrepreneurship Program in Nigeria since 2015 as well as the USA based non-profit These Numbers Have Faces since 2016.

column186:
DESCRIPTION
Ambition is the foundation of our story. It is the fire that illuminates our path to becoming an organization of global Best Practices that believes in being our customers Trusted Advisor in the area of Document Management, Professional Print and Technology Solutions.
With decades of experience in over 18 countries across Africa, we understand that every company is faced with glocal hurdles that are uniquely different. We therefore believe that our solutions need to be just as distinctive, which is why we create customized Document and Technology Solutions that are suitable across diverse situations, providing measurable outcomes that will withstand the ups and downs that your journey may bring.
Change is an intrinsic part of progress, and one that we have used to create, build and innovate together. We understand your passion, your determination, and your desire for success. Not just because we see it, but because we believe in it.

For the past 35 years, we have overcome challenges, discovered unique solutions, modernized industries and conquered limits. Today we are a testament to our past, pioneers who see the world differently, and our vision is to help remarkable companies build efficiency, improve workflows and optimize performance.

DESCRIPTION
Spiderbit is a technology company that builds custom solutions, from concept and strategy, to design, implementation and support. We have three have three main products, which are eHaho (an online platform that connects all individuals involved in agrarian sector), Doxa (an ERP software that gives companies abilities to streamline customary strategies, making efficiencies, restricting costs and enhancing control over broad exercises), and Duka (online platform that gives fundamental strategy for keeping all business records on the web). We also partner with clients to create and support innovative solutions that help businesses become a lasting success in the marketplace, we are specialized in software development, mobile apps, web development, UI design, domain registration, web-hosting, and other professional IT services. We have a clear understanding of the both design and development requirements, and we have the knowledge, skills and experience to successfully complete our client’s projects.

KINYAMATEKA | Ni ikinyamakuru cy'Inama y'Abepiskopi Gatolika mu Rwanda. Yashinzwe na Padiri Goubau Antoine ivukira i Kabgayi mu 1933.


INTEGO | Intego ya Kinyamateka ni ni ugutoza abantu gukunda Imana no kubana neza mu rukundo rwa Kivandimwe.

KINYAMATEKA, itangaza amakuru y'Iyogezabutumwa n'andi makuru Arebana n'iterambere ry'imibereho myiza no kwimakaza umuco w'amahoro.


Kinyamateka icapye isohoka rimwe mu kwezi mu gihe amakuru yayo asohoka buri munsi binyuze ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zayo no ku rubuga rwayo ari rwo www.kinyamateka.rw. Uretse amakuru ya Kiliziya n'Arebana n'iyobokamana, usangamo amakuru y'uburezi n'umuco, ubuzima, Politiki, imikino n'imyidagaduro,n'andi makuru agezweho kandi azira gukabiriza.

Kinyamateka ntiyandika amakuru asebanya cyangwa aca igikuba.

column280:
DESCRIPTION
Soaps For Africa, a little company dedicated to the production of handmade soaps with natural ingredients and traditional techniques. We want to share with you, a little of our passion for creating high quality products, in a responsible way with the environment.



We are proud to say that all the ingredients we use to make our handmade soaps are carefully selected and come from local and sustainable suppliers.



We believe that each soap is a work of art, which is why we focus on making unique and high-quality handmade soaps.

We use traditional techniques and experiment with different ingredients to offer a wide variety of options for all applications and needs.




In addition, we are always available to answer any questions or concerns that our customers may have, whether it is about our products, the ingredients we use, or any other topic related to handmade soaps.



At Soaps For Africa we pride ourselves on high quality products and exceptional customer service. Thank you for trusting us and we hope you enjoy our products as much as we enjoy creating them!

column292:
DESCRIPTION
Our Mission
To ensure that our clients are well and properly insured at/in the right period of insurance, at best favorable terms and conditions and right premium.

Our Vision
To be one of the fastest-growing insurance brokers in Rwanda and the region, providing a one-stop solution for a wide range of services like Best Tailor Made Insurance Solutions, Claims Management, Insurance Audit, and Renewal Reviews.
To always look forward to welcoming our clients to build an everlasting and a growing relationship with them. And seek to provide the peace of mind for our clients through high-quality insurance products, backed with business ethical values and exceptional service at No extra cost.

Our Philosophy
Our business model is client-focused. Our clients are placed in the heart of our attention because they are the backbone of our business philosophy. We strive to foster long-term relationships with our clients and we are continuously aware of most of their expectations from us. Our local knowledge is of paramount importance to our business. As a homegrown insurance broker, our knowledge, be it of the technical, business environment, regulatory or cultural nature, brings us closer to our clients and allows us to design better solutions for their needs and problems.

Our Values
Deliver quick and effective service
Nurture lasting relationship with clients
Have technical and professional expertise

column310:
DESCRIPTION
DAC Tours and Travel Ltd is a Rwanda registered Tour Operator. It was established in 2010 as a small car rental company in Kigali,Rwanda.Its Head Office is located in Kigali.

Your safari with Dac Tours & Travel will be characterized with magical experiences You’ll laugh, you’ll cry and you’ll perhaps fall in love with the beautiful wilderness. There are no hidden extras. Dac Tours & Travel team comprises of professional, passionate and knowledgeable staff members who will advise you, provide you with adequate knowledge about your desire safari itineraries and specialized Rwanda/ Uganda Safari locations showcasing the rich African culture, people and history, Nature,Wildlife and Primates tracking and the most fantastic activity, gorilla trekking in the Volcanoes National Park – Rwanda as well as Bwindi national park in Uganda.


For many, a safari in East Africa is a life-time dream. While you are virtually guaranteed to see animals with any reputable safari operator, DAC Tours & Travel tries to give you something above just game viewing. We strive to understand exactly what your dream is and to turn your trip into an unforgettable adventure in Rwanda,Uganda,Kenya or Uganda, sunrise over Ngorongoro, Endless stretches of the Serengeti and Masai Mara savanna,Climbing Mt Kilimanjaro or gorilla trekking in Rwanda, Bird watching in Uganda, Whatever your dream, our mission is to make it come true.

DESCRIPTION
UMOJA Logistics is a fast growing logistics business with interests in freight forwarding, customs clearing, warehousing, trucking and distribution across Eastern Africa. We focus on serving customers with global sourcing and supply-chain-management needs; through creating values and innovative end-to-end international logistics services.

Our dedicated team of professionals strive to provide customers with various cargo requirements with tailor-made logistics solutions, customized to your particular needs.

We also develop and deploy practical transportation, warehousing and distribution services in Eastern Africa covering Kenya, Uganda, Tanzania, Rwanda, Burundi, Transit goods to GOMA & BUKAVU.

column374:
DESCRIPTION
Business Information

Business Name: yofobe4u Rwanda
Email: Info@yofobe4u.rw

General Business Activities yofobe4u Corporation has been established as a real estate company in North and South Rwanda. Our traditional business model is based on the accomplishment of properties in the real estate markets in Rwanda. the company has invested portions of its assets in the purchase and sale of securities such as stocks and bonds as well as Forex trading on local markets.

Company Strategy

PurposeTo be a leader in the real estate industry by providing enhanced services, relationship and profitability.
Vision To provide quality services that exceeds the expectations of our esteemed customers.
Mission statement To build long term relationships with our customers and clients and provide exceptional customer services by pursuing business through innovation and advanced technology.

Core values
• We believe in treating our customers with respect and faith• We grow through creativity, invention and innovation.
• We integrate honesty, integrity and business ethics into all aspects of our business functioning
Goals
• Regional expansion in the field of property management and develop a strong base of key customers.
• Increase the assets and investments of the company to support the development of services.

• To build good reputation in the field of real estate and property management and become a key player in the industry.

Scope of Work

yofobe4u Corporation conducts real estate marketing as well as real estate consulting. The company undertakes all maintenance duties for real estate facilities and organizations and conducts all the security and surveillance for the properties.

Required Banking Services include savings account, checking account, online banking, and secured credit card and debit card.

Let Great Ape Safaris take you on an adventure of a lifetime with personalized tours through Rwanda, Kenya, Uganda, Tanzania and Congo. Whether you want a short trip trekking the mountain gorillas or spend weeks making the most of the diverse wildlife, beauty and culture that undiscovered East Africa has to offer, our experienced local tour guides will make your journey smooth, secure and unforgettable. You haven’t experienced a Rwandan safari until you have experienced it through our eyes.

DESCRIPTION
Welcome to Harmony Safari Expeditions(E.A). It was created to serve the various needs of travelers in East Africa, as well as promoting East Africa as a travel destination. Harmony Safari Expeditions specializes in offering the best adventures in E.Africa. We provide an unrivaled choice of quality escorted tour packages to E.Africa packed with exciting daily sightseeing highlights and features. Our safari offers a variety of activities in Rwanda, Uganda,Kenya,Tanzania and Congo, such as safaris, city tours, white water rafting, boat trips, fishing trips, horseback riding, community walks, mountain climbing, gorilla trekking, cultural tours, domestic flight bookings, honey moon safaris, beach holidays and more. Harmony Safari Expeditions can also assist you with, car hire and accommodation bookings.

We cater for individuals, families, business and leisure travel. Our dedicated and experienced team will help you with all of your travel requirements within our capabilities. Personal attention is our first priority when attending to your travel needs.

column455:
DESCRIPTION
Praudience is a Rwanda-based consulting firm specializing in strategic communication, public relations, documentation, editing, translation and localization. Praudience develops appropriate communication strategies and materials, manages public relations and documents projects’ results and impact with case studies, success stories, best practices and lessons learned. Praudience also provides editing, translation and localization services for the main languages spoken in Rwanda (English, French and Kinyarwanda).

Praudience helps organizations to effectively engage with stakeholders, demonstrate the success of their work, ensure that people understand what they do and join them and even own up their initiatives.

Praudience has a vast network of consultants specializing in different areas with many years of experience. It is people-oriented and always committed to help its diverse clientele to achieve its specific developmental goals.


Clients include organizations of all sizes that seek either to improve or strategize their communication activities, communicate their vision and impact using the most appropriate tools and languages as well as manage their reputation and brand
Our expertise stems from many years of practical experience in communication field across Africa dealing with regional and national organizations with a diversity of audiences.

The Eye Magazine Rwanda is the BCP Investment Managers Ltd (a Rwanda Capital Market Authority Licensed Investment and Fund Manager Company) magazine. This tour magazine not only showcases investment opportunities but also provides contact information for businesses and organizations for Rwanda and the surrounding region. Dubbed “the insider’s Investment opportunities and Business tour guide in Rwanda,” and having been in existence since 2005, we currently distribute a substantial number of the magazines free of charge throughout Rwanda; ensuring accessibility to all and through selected partners in Uganda, Kenya, DRC, Burundi and beyond.

Our target audience is composed of government ministries and agencies, businesses, tourists, expatriates, and high end clients. We also avail copies to embassies, major organizations, banks, insurance companies, hospitals, schools, hotels, NGOs, tour and travel companies and the golf clubs.

column525:
DESCRIPTION
Professional Real Estate Agency
The Iwawe Properties Rwanda operates as both a Sales and Property Management Agency. The Professionals office incorporating, The Rent Shop has enjoyed 7 years of success as Kigali’s premiere real estate agency. The team at Iwawe Properties Rwanda are highly motivated and eager to provide you with exceptional service in the sale, purchase and management of local properties.

Maximum exposure to our clientele is ensured as our office is located in the main village precinct of Kigali Remera,Yuassa House 3rd floor with a huge shop frontage of 40 metres and bold signage. We are equipped with the latest in computer technology, new LED lighting A3 Window cards and worldwide exposure through multiple Internet websites. We also offer professional print media advertising and in house digital design, as well as providing efficient and excellent customer service.

As a Private business, we have been actively involved in the community for approximately the past 7 years and are highly respected professionally and personally. We sponsor many local groups and sporting organisations & Iwawe has been involved in major infrastructure projects that benefit the communities of Rwanda.

Our Agents Muganga Zack and the management are a team, and are the new generation in real estate. They have become the most proactive and successful selling duo in Kigali,Rwanda by embracing technology whilst still maintaining old school business values.

Iwawe Cleaning Services

Cleaner to take care of your facilities and carry out cleaning and maintenance duties.

The goal is to keep our building in a clean and orderly condition.

Responsibilities
Clean, stock and supply designated facility areas (dusting, sweeping, vacuuming, mopping, cleaning ceiling vents, restroom cleaning etc)
Perform and document routine inspection and maintenance activities

Carry out heavy cleansing tasks and special projects

Notify management of occurring deficiencies or needs for repairs
Make adjustments and minor repairs
Stock and maintain supply rooms
Cooperate with the rest of the staff
Follow all health and safety regulations

Gem stone Retail

WAZAIRE GEMS


WazaireGems is a mining company located in Nairobi, Kenya that deals in the mining and selling of precious gemstones and minerals. Our vast array of collection includes Amethyst, Blue Sapphire, Green Garnet, Diamond, Gold and many others. Our business is widely maintained by the company's mining sites located in Voi and Tanzania.


The company officially began in 1994 in Congo, later shifting to Dubai to expand its network and access to clients. After its web of clients broadened, it settled in Nairobi where its current headquarter is located.


The company has expanded quickly due to its expansive number of workers that have continued to join the team in both its mining and office activities. Mining research has taken a key precedence to ensure better efficiency and higher numbers of gemstone discovery. The mine in Mkuku, Voi currently holds 82 workers while 25 are situated in the head office.

Our current major areas of export are Tanzania, Bangkok, South Africa, Hong Kong, Dubai and China


Wholesale Trade

Capable of large quantity of goods from various producers or vendors, warehouses them, and resells to retailers. Wholesalers who carry only non-competing goods or lines are called distributors.


Animal Feeds

Feed Ingredients and Finished Feeds Poultry, Dairy and Aquafeed

column585:
DESCRIPTION
Medlive Marketing is a medical equipment supplier with its head office in Cape Town, the second capital of South Africa and branches in , Botswana , Ghana , Kenya , Lesotho, Malawi , Mozambique , Namibia , Swaziland , Zambia ,Uganda, Johannesburg South Africa and Harare Zimbabwe that specializes in medical supplies & equipment, surgical products, hospital equipments, theatre products , hospital furniture, laboratory equipment's, pharmaceutical products and medical disposables to all medical industry internationally. Our network is specifically designed for large professional clinics, hospitals, remote and mobile clinics.

We carry all major brands available to you, specialize in identifying medical products, goods, services that will fill the market demand in medical industry sector with full international warranty and also serve to introduce high quality products made in and out of South Africa. Our goal is to become your supplier, partner in building a strong health policy and successful business relationship.


At Medlive Marketing, meeting our customers' needs is more than just a goal Infect it is the basis of our entire corporate philosophy. The existence of our group rests on the belief that our products will earn satisfaction from customers worldwide. Our attention to detail and our friendly, experienced and fully insured staff have managed to create a thriving business with an impeccable reputation. Reflecting the importance of this belief is our strong emphasis to be the leading supplier of high standard products. Quality in the manufacturing, supplying, exporting process and the highest of after sales customer care enable us to achieve this.

DESCRIPTION
CIMG & Associates plc is a leading business process improvement and
management consulting firm, helping organizations to be significantly
more efficient, effective and financially profitable.
We provide best practices business optimization solutions to implement
address process, technology & organizational improvements.
CIMG & Associates facilitates, enhanced competitiveness through multi
faceted interventions leading to Business Improvement through
consulting, people, process and operational assessments,

benchmarking and resource provisioning through Quality Outsourcing.
We carefully select our consultants in order to offer our customers
foremost quality of expertise together with extensive experience of
industry practices. Our consultants have substantial track record of
executing major consulting assignments involving organization wide
deployment, multi geography, and on the advisory mode for continuous
process improvement

column679:
DESCRIPTION


Reliable Travel and Tour Agency is the industry leaders in the tours and travel trade and represent a wide spectrum of travel and vacation packages available in Rwanda.

Mission:

To uphold ethical business practices among our members while ensuring sustainable development of the tourism industry in Rwanda.

Vision:
To preserve and protect our heritage and environment through integrated tourism development in Rwanda.
Objectives:
To develop mechanisms for unification and loyalty of tour operators and travel agent’s interests in dynamic and effective way
To put in place amicable conflicts settlement and arbitration as well as assistance to the development of good and coherent business atmosphere
To ensure the representation of the tour operators and travel agents in the partnership between private, public sectors as well as Non Governmental Organization
Improvement of member business knowledge and understanding and subsequent professional performance

To establish rules and regulation and recommend guidelines for new members in Rwanda’s tourism and travel industry
Maintain Rwanda’s good reputation as a tourist destination by making sure that tour operators and travel agents maintain high and professional ethics and standards and give value of services rendered to visitors.

Sharpen Jobs Ltd is a Human Resource Management consultancy firm specialized in outsourcing employees that significantly increase our clients' revenues; we also deliver trainings that target to enhance Human Resource Capacity for our Clients' staff. Specifically, we focus on the following services;

- Full recruitment
- Headhunting
- CV on request
- Job/Tenders adverts display on our Job portal
- Outsourcing
- Payroll
- Trainings

At Sharpen Jobs, we not only recruit for you the right candidates but we also train them and make a follow-up to keep track of their performances and in case you're not contented with their performances, we will get for you a replacement at no additional costs.

column787:
DESCRIPTION
Vita MEDIA is a Rwandan media for development production company founded
in 2009 and registered with Rwanda Development Board (RDB) We are media
producers and communication tools developers.
Our specialty is Journalism for development.
Our key members, partners and professional employees are people trained in Journalism
and Communication as well as other related fields.
Our skills and experience in production Society can be reliable to achieve specific goals
in communications.
At VITA MEDIA we are dedicated to creating media and content unique and effective
to communicate with impact
We have worked and performed well as the list of our clients shows in the following fields:
• Media for development
• Journalism
• Communications
• Peace building
• Agriculture
• Microfinance (Making Microfinance work, saving and financial literacy).
• The Creatives (Graphic designers, artists, copywriter and publishers)
• Researchers
The vision of VITA MEDIA is to become the leading media production company with
national and international brand recognition whilst empowering our clients to reach
their goals
Our mission is to empower and motivate companies and organizations to deliver
educative and informative messages to both national and international audience.
Our Founding Principles:
Integrity, Professionalism, Excellence, Individual Respect and Responsibility, Reliability
and Social Responsibility are our core values .
Our services
1. Video productions
2. Photography
3. Radio production
4. Print media (books, magazines, newspapers, flyers)
5. Media and public relations
6. Production of communication materials
7. Web development and design

column790:
DESCRIPTION
AMARISSA BUSINESS SYSTEM Ltd is a private company which offer the services of fumigation in cargo containers, stacks of food in warehouses....and General pest control include mosquitoes, cockroaches, cochineal, rats, snakes control and also Anti-preventive termites.
We provide these services to all types of clients such as in Hotels and Apartments, restaurants, institutions like schools and universities, residences, offices among others. We are more experienced whereby our technicians have experience of over 6 years in such field and we are very equipped with every materials that could help us to render a satisfactory service to meet with our clients' needs.

When the customer chooses our services, we assure him to have a quality services on a reasonable price

CORNERSTONE GREAT LAKES offers accountancy professional services including Bookkeeping, Accounting, Tax, Assurance and Advisory services. We have a range of clients across all business sectors small, medium and large corporates.

DESCRIPTION
Translation Palace is a translation company based in Kigali, Rwanda. They deal with linguistic hurdles and try their best to reach the highest desire of their clients. In order to ensure the quality of your translation, Translation Palace Ltd. works with professional translators / linguists who translate into their native languages. Their translators deal with various specifications including but not limited to law, government, business, insurance, software, advertising, education, literature and many others.

At Translation Palace, they translate as many types of documents as possible such as Birth Certificates, Divorce Certificates, Marriage Certificates, Celibacy Certificate, Death Certificates, Technical Manuals, Police Clearances, Diplomas, Degrees and Transcripts, Employee Handbook, Personal Correspondence, Secondary School Certificates, Medical Manuals, Driver Licenses, Passports, Employee Manuals, Immunization Cards, Medical Reports, Etc.


In addition, Translation Palace works with authorized notaries to certify the translation of the aforementioned documents.
