We offer unique, Custom and tailor-made safaris ranging from individual to group safaris and tours all across the East African Region
For over ten years we’ve have been building and establishing ourselves as East Africa’s top tier Destination Management Company by providing exclusive and self-customized tourism experiences

We provide our clients with dedicated personal specialists that ensure your seamless experiences from the point of inquiry to building lasting memories
Our tours, Safaris and experiences are ideal for all categories of clients ranging from private, small and big groups as well as luxury and romantic experiences

Our 7 Datacenters with more than 105 servers have the space to create 58,899+ VPSs around the world, call us "Best hosting provider" as we offer Cheap VPS Servers, We are worldwide recognized, we offer Live chat Support 24/7.

We migrated to the digital world and everything you buy from us is automatically set up, if you buy a web hosting at 1:00 AM midnight, you will get it without anyone to set it up, we use the machine learning technology to deliver all services to our customer without any delay of waiting for an agent.


Our smallest web hosting package is 6000RWF/year, yes excluding VAT with these features: Unlimited Domains, Unlimited Bandwidth, Unlimited Emails, cPanel on WHM, No Hidden Prices, Fast LiteSpeed Web Server, Free SSL Certificates, Free Malware Scans, Free Backups & Restores.

The web hosting industry hasn't been better than today when Bazasoft opens its gate. We are full-time workers, even if one of our staff members goes to bed, our Intelligent Robot talks with clients and delivers services to them until a staff wakes up.


Believe it or not, If you need the best Web designer or a cheap Web Hosting, please go ahead and open our website https://bazasoft.rw/

We create modern software products for business management, based on Client/Server and Internet/Intranet/Mobile technology solutions in accordance with the leading world standards in the field of IT.


Our vast experience in the area of Fintech, Telecom and system integration allows us to develop state of art products that beat our patron’s expectations.

Sharpen Skills Ltd is Training and Management improvement consultancy firm specialized in delivering trainings that target to enhance Human Resource Capacity for our Clients. The firm was incorporated on 18/06/2013.This firm brings together a pool of professionals and experts with various sets of soft skills and experience including; Sales and Marketing, Leadership, Tourism and Hospitality, Change Management, Workplace languages, career guidance, etiquette Skills, counseling, , Customer care and Work Readiness Program among others.

Sharpen Skills works with corporate companies to provide on-the-job trainings, induction trainings, special trainings and Refresher trainings as a way of materializing maximum potential of job-role holders that consequently yield maximum production at the workplace.

Sharpen Skills Ltd exists to bridge the gap between the jobs opportunities and the skilled workforce.

We are much focused on learning and innovation towards work, flexibility and cooperation with clients and partners is something we value most.

Our Skilling programs span multiple industry sectors including:-

DESCRIPTION
TASS Gateway and Travels ltd, We are a leading tour and travel management company, specializing in Medical tourism, local and foreign tour services, assisting with admissions to Universities/Colleges abroad, we book and issue flight tickets for both domestic and international Airline at a tremendous cost advantage.
TASS Gateway and Travels Ltd is aiming at giving an art of service that gives travelers confident in their journeys sure of stress out of travel, with world class service delivery “Beyond Satisfaction’’
- Giving the travelers confidence
- A one stop center for travel services.
- Self-driven employees serving on mission of gaining world experience
Company Vision

Our Vision is to become the principal in tourism by reaching undiscovered areas, connecting unconnected and making travelers journey seamless & positive.
TASS Gateway & Travels wants to make an impact on the Rwandans and expand to East Africa and all Africa by creating a trustable successful company that serves people with different services to help and solve their needs.
The company wants to put its workers to exposure so they can embrace the global view and develop their skills through different tourism training.
OUR MISSION:
TASS Gateway and Travels our mission is to be One Stop Center for Domestic & international travel services offering comprehensive travel management to enable stress free travel environment.
OUR VALUES:
Customer Service: we focus on taking good care of our clients, listening to their needs and providing solutions to fit their budget in a timely manner.
Integrity: we value our customers and partners and our first priority is to operate with honest integrity.

Team Work: We believe in working together with our employees and partners to provide the best solutions for our clients.
Product/Service Offering
TASS Gateway and Travels ltd, is handling transfers between multiple destinations, event planning services, group travel arrangements and more.

The founders of Maj Consulting Ltd are qualified accountants and with extensive experience in accounting, taxation, auditing and advisory services in various industries.

The objective of Maj Consulting Ltd is to provide customized services in the market in the field of accounting and tax advisory. Our goal is to ensure that every client is attended as per his needs as opposed to the generic solutions that don’t add value to the organisation. DESCRIPTION
Finance International Centre is a consulting firm providing specialized consulting and training services in the field of Audit, microfinance, business development, microenterprise management, tax advisory, marketing and general trade. We strive to provide our partners with insights and analyses that can become the basis for practical product and service innovations. Finance International Centre was incorporated under the laws of the Republic of Rwanda in 2014. Its headquarters are located in Kigali, the capital city of Rwanda and has opened filed Office at Nyamasheke, in the Centre of Tyazo.

Finance International Centre was created with the purpose of providing consultancy services in Rwanda and outside. Finance International Centre has a big market share targeting SACCOs, Microfinance institutions in Rwanda, Cooperative organizations in various domains, Companies and individual business practitioners.


Finance International Centre is Lisensed as Auditor of Microfinance Institutions and Saccos by the Central Bank of Rwanda (BNR) and is in partnership with Child and Youth Finance International (CYFI), in financial education program;and with AMIR Consult Ltd (Association of Microfinance in Rwanda)in Training programs and Audit in Saccos and Microfinance institutions.

DESCRIPTION
Wouessi is a digital intelligence company focused on delivering intelligent digital solutions by combining solid business foundations with global technical and digital expertise. Our goal is to help small and medium-size companies deliver quantifiable and sustainable results by optimizing their digital footprint through increased brand awareness, lead generation, and online sales.

Wouessi was founded by a group of innovation-driven, enthusiastic entrepreneurs, with a combined experience of over 30 years in the technology and digital spaces. Proficiency in multiple languages such as English, French and Portuguese has provided us with a unique and strong presence in Rwanda, Cameroon, Ghana, Nigeria, Egypt, Kenya, Mozambique, Sierra Leone, Ivory Coast.


At Wouessi, we combine our business solutions and technical know-how to create tailored digital intelligence solutions to uniquely meet each of our client’s needs. We provide them with the latest cutting edge technologies and digital marketing efforts to maximize return on investment (ROI), scalability, and efficiency. Our aim is to bring digital and technology solutions in the space of computational decision making with the use of Artificial Intelligence (AI), digital innovation by providing value to businesses across the world.

DESCRIPTION
Apogee Tours and Safaris Ltd is an exceptional tours and safaris company that creates magical journeys to the very heart of Africa. Our ranges of service explore the forgotten treasures of Africa, particularly Rwanda the land of thousand Hills, Uganda, Tanzania and Kenya.

Apogee Tours is a leading provider of tour services to all over in Rwanda and East Africa. We offer tour packages and organize customized trips, corporate tours, airport transfers, hotel bookings, transportations services, events management and coverage, meetings and events planning, car rental services, air reservations and ticketing services.

At Apogee Tours and Safaris, we maintain a large fleet of multiple options for cars and coaches that will add luxury to your enthusiastic trip. We provide luxury cars for hire. With our strong commitment, we have a widespread network of associates all over East Africa providing personalized services to our clients.


We offer services for many occasions including airport transfers, corporate events, wedding cars, weekend tours, school trips, meetings and conferences, inbound tours in Rwanda; you can entrust with you tour plan and we make it a reality.

Apogee Tours and Safaris Ltd carefully designs travel plan and provide best travel related information and make travel planning easier, secure and cost effective, with experienced drivers , well maintained cars, reliable services, optional small, mid-size or luxury cars available, punctual service- we deliver your specialized transport when and how you need it.
column46:
DESCRIPTION
AUGUSTINE TOURS is your partner in travels and tours to Burundi and Rwanda.

Come and experience our hospitality wherever you go and get in touch with our wide variety of fascinating cultures and local traditions. Our people are ready to show you our countries natural wonders draw you into the rhythm and soul of Africa, give you close encounters with our regal wildlife and take you on an unforgettable journey through our ancient and recent past.
What we do

Our force is to design customized itineraries for individuals and small groups with specific needs and particular interests. We strive to offer our clients, who are looking for a travel in Burundi and Rwanda, the best service and the most suitable itinerary for each individual. All you have to do is look at the sample itineraries at our website, choose them, or adapt them to you own wishes, or ignore them completely and create your own itinerary and send it to us. We will respond as soon as possible with a proposal based on your criteria
Tours

How it is nice and educational to travel with a local company .What will you get with us?

Gorillas and chimpanzee Tours, birding, historical and cultural tours, airport transfers, hotel booking, travel advices and other information related to your travel plan at no cost.


Book Hotel


We dream of being able to help you travel to the smallest village, the largest city, the most remote corner of East Africa.
The dream here is not to find a room for us; the dream is to find you the Travelers of the planet, the room you desire, from a Five Star Resort to a budget hotel for you coming to our countries. A home stay in some east african country, a room for the person who needs a room tonight. Talk to us, a swift program and quotation of your travel needs within a time not exceeding 24 hours will be sent to you!

More info:www.augustinetours.com

column87:
DESCRIPTION
Home Rwanda Safaris is a travel and tour agency based in Kigali City, Rwanda. Home Rwanda Safaris caters to both group and individual clients. Since our humble beginnings, we have assisted local and foreign tourists in organizing their travel itinerary, hotel and accommodation, travel documents such as airline tickets. The expertise that we acquired from our first hand product knowledge and airline tools help us provide wide range of travel services for our valued clients around the world, we cater to numerous corporate clients, tourists and other travel enthusiasts to bring them closer to well-loved domestic and international destinations that will not only educate them but will also build lasting memories embodied by our travel services and tours. As your personalized travel planners, we aim to bring you comfortable, satisfactory and affordable vacation packages based on your requirements and we offer complete local and international ground arrangements at very competitive prices. Known for its efficient and professional service, Home Rwanda Safaris has become a dynamic member of Rwanda travel industry.Home Rwanda Safaris has strong partnership with SafariBookings (SafariBookings.com),There are various elegances of trips on offer to cater for different perceptions, along with a wide range of destinations and departure dates, with enthusiastic and helpful guides to assist you during your trip. A commitment to excellence in service, competent marketing, bold product development and competitive rates contributed to the growth of the company.

DESCRIPTION
BM Engineering was Established in Rwanda in 2018 by two entrepreneurial minded East Africans with years of combine experience in security systems dedicated to providing advanced MEP custom tailored solutions and services to our clients across East Africa, we offer a full range of top of the line residential, commercial, government and industrial security systems from the world’s most trusted brands while adhering to standard building codes, regulations and requirements.
our Company is one of the leading service providers in consultancy, supply and service support of Building Management Systems (BMS), Safety Systems and Asset Management Systems with complete service portfolio including installation of both hardware and software solutions for our clients and we assure them with a premium assistance to maximize their benefits in our collaboration.

We protect workers, buildings and company assets with complete service portfolio including supply ,installation and maintenance of CCTV systems, Access control systems, fire suppression systems, firefighting equipment, hybrid IP-PBX, fibre optics termination and splicing, alarm systems, time management systems, electric services, building and management systems, service & maintenance, control room design, UPS installation, intelligent building systems, networking, air conditioning, cable management and among other services.

We assist our clients in setting up an infrastructure which enables regional and national managers’ view and manage their business remotely. This reduces costs to your business and offer flexibility to business owners to access ongoing operations at anytime from anywhere.
At BM Engineering, we value our customers. We endeavor to provide personalized customer service and keep you updated with innovative security solutions. Let BM Engineering be your choice security provider and protects what matters most to you.

DESCRIPTION
Welcome to ZEBRA ARTWORKS GROUP/ ZAG-Rwanda, a premier interior design firm based in Kigali, Rwanda. Our mission is to create stunning, functional spaces that reflect our clients’ unique personalities and preferences.

Founded in 2020, ZAG-Rwanda brings together a diverse team of skilled designers with a passion for creating beautiful interiors. Led by our founder Mr. Jean Victor ISHIMWE, our team is dedicated to delivering exceptional service and innovative design solutions.

We offer a range of interior/ Exterior design services, from initial concept and planning to final installation and styling. Our expertise includes residential, commercial, and hospitality design, and we take pride in working collaboratively with our clients to exceed their expectations.


At ZAG-Rwanda, We believe that great design should be accessible to everyone. That’s why we work hard to provide exceptional value by maximizing our clients’ budgets without compromising on quality.

Our commitment to excellence has earned us a reputation as one of the top interior design firms in Kigali, Rwanda. We invite you to explore our portfolio and contact us to learn more about how we can help transform your space into something truly spectacular. Have Love.

DESCRIPTION
Ikompanyi DTL imaze imyaka isaga icyenda icuruza ibikoresho by’Ikoranabuhanga ikomora mu Buhinde iramenyesha abakiriya bayo ko yimutse aho yakoreraga hazwi nka City Plaza kuri ubu ikaba irimo gukorera mu muryango wa 20 muri gare yo mu mujyi ahazwi nka Down Town kandi ikomeje kugabanya ibiciro ku bigo bicunga umutekano n’abantu ku giti cyabo baguze ibikoresho byinshi.

Mu kiganiro na IGIHE, Sulaiman Kayibanda, Umuyobozi ushinzwe ubucuruzi mu DTL yatangaje ko iyi kompanyi ikomeje gutanga serivisi nziza n’ibikoresho biramba.

Ati “ Icyo twabwira abakiriya bacu ni uko n’ubundi ibikoresho byacu ari bya bindi biramba bikorerwa mu Buhinde kandi iyo uguze igikoresho kikagira ikibazo tuguhindurira cyangwa tukakigukorera ku buntu mu gihe cy’umwaka.”

Kayibanda yakomeje avuga ko ku bantu baguze ibikoresho birenze bitanu icyarimwe babagabanyiriza ibiciro ku buryo bugaragara ngo uretse n’ubusanzwe ibiciro byabo bidakanganye.

Ati” Iyo uguze byinshi turagutwaza tukabikugereza aho ubijyanye ariko n’iyo uguze ibikoresho birenze bitanu icyarimwe nabwo turakugabanyiriza mu buryo bufatika.”


Bitewe n’uburambe iyi kompanyi ifite ngo bamaze kugera kuri porogaramu y’ikoranabuhanga (application) umuntu ashyira muri telefoni ye noneho ikamufasha gukurikirana ibyo camera zicunga umutekano zirimo gufata n’iyo yaba ari kure y’aho izo camera ziri nko mu mahanga cyangwa ahandi hategereye aho ziri.


Uretse ibi bikoresho bicunga umutekano hari n’utumashini tugenzura igihe abakozi baziye ku kazi n’igihe batahiye (Time attendance machine), za mudasobwa z’amoko atandukanye n’ibindi bikoresho by’ikoranabuhanga byose bikorerwa mu Buhinde.

Ukeneye ibindi bisobanuro cyangwa kumenya byinshi kuri serivisi batanga wabahamagara kuri 0786984106 ndetse no kuri 0783072079. Ushobora no kubandikira kuri cctvgaurav@gmail.com cyangwa ukabasura ku biro byabo biri muri gare ahazwi nka Downtown, hateganye n’aho bategera imodoka za Kinyinya.Ni ku muryango wa 20 ahegeranye no kwa Nyirangarama.
column121:
DESCRIPTION
1. COMPANY BACKGROUND

EVERLIVE INVESTMENT CORPORATION LTD Also known as EVERLIVE GROUP was founded as a grocery trading store on March 05, 2021, by Alphonse NSHIMIYIMANA, who started his business in Rwanda, Kigali city trading different goods made in Rwanda as a small shopping mall. But due to Covid-19 pandemic, Alphonse has been inspired with an idea of empowering his business focusing heavily on e-commerce trading and on industrialization with the goal of helping his country resist itself during the Covid-19 pandemic period.

At this time he turned his business into a multinational conglomerate with the aim of creating high quality innovated and improved products, helping domestic companies effectively develop, implement and manage their business and accessing markets around the world either online and physically in its shopping malls branches as well as shielding them from trainings and competitions and providing them easy and cheap financial investment.


The company is now aimed at providing Training services, post graduate programs, Business development services, business-to-business (B2B) sales services via web portal as well as electronic payment, shopping, cloud computing services, Financial services, Hospitality services, Medical & Health care services, estate & construction services and comprise numerous companies around the world in numerous business sectors, most of them united under the”Everlive” trade mark.


The company offers a platform for investors and financials by proposing them projects of its Affiliate and its Projects owners by proposing them investors to corporate with and businesses to reach the right materials and customers anywhere they are.

2. VISION, MISSION AND CORE VALUES

A. OUR VISON

Is to inspire the world with innovative technologies, high quality products and designs that enrich people’s lives and contribute to social prosperity by creating a new future.

B. OUR MISSION

Is to devote human and technological resources to create superior high quality products and services hereby helping global society simplify, improve and maximize their potential lives

C. OUR MAIN PILLARS
Becoming powerful – Saving people’s life – Living everlastingly

D. CORE VALUES

We are engaged to provide high quality products and services based on Trust, Honesty, Integrity, Accountability, and Commitment to our clients/affiliates and partners.

DESCRIPTION
CET Ltd is an engineering consultancy and sustainable energy solutions provider. Established in 2010, with our head office in Kigali, we focus on providing customized, innovative, turnkey renewable energy and energy efficiency solutions as well as on-going maintenance and support. Our expertise spans across various technologies including: Solar PV systems, solar thermal,and energy efficiency.

Our Vision: To create sustainable energy solutions for the challenges of tomorrow

Mission: We design and implement sustainable energy solutions that address client-specific needs and provide a solid return on investment. Using a collaborative engineering approach, we offer a comprehensive portfolio of cutting edge technologies to provide custom designed high quality solutions. We strive for excellence in client service provision and sustainable value creation.


We Distribute Solar and Back-up Power products from World's best renewable energy Manufacturers - We supply solar and power backup equipment on a wholesale basis, We also design,Install professionally all kind of solar and backup power systems.

column181:
DESCRIPTION
HERMOSA LIFE TOURS & TRAVEL LTD is an indigenous East African Rwandan tour operator organizing Gorilla trekking safaris & tours in Rwanda as well as wildlife safaris, fully registered and licensed in Kigali Rwanda. A percentage of our profits support the local community around parks. We drive travelers’ interests providing them with their desired ultimate safari experiences in Rwanda and all around East Africa. Our committed staff has offered excellent services to several group clients and individual travelers over the years, as well as promoting Rwanda-the pearl of Africa as the world`s best tourist destination as well as other East African destinations. Hermosa Life Tours & Travel Ltd offers Rwanda Safaris such as Gorilla tracking safaris and Chimpanzee Trekking, prime wild game tours, Mountain Climbing adventures, city tours, boat cruise trips, fishing trips, horseback riding, bird watching, Car hire and hotel booking. We run safaris in all the major Rwanda National Game Parks.

DESCRIPTION
We are a successful Rwandan-based company, founded by two local logisticians with over 8 years of moving experience. Over the years in the industry, we have learned a lot about packing and moving. Today we provide best-in-class moving services for all your moving needs, from office to house or any other personal belongings in impeccable condition.

NIKA Movers ltd Company serves customers in Kigali and all across Rwanda, helping you move your belongings quickly and safely both locally and abroad. With 6 years of experience reaching the highest standards in relocation and logistics, we know exactly which difficulties to anticipate, and how to overcome any challenge and difficult circumstance. We have a thorough understanding of our client's needs and we work hard to move your belongings efficiently, freeing up your time for organizing and decorating your new home without a delay.

column204:
DESCRIPTION
Wika Translate is East Africa’s professional translation provider. we have committed ourselves to pushing the boundaries of language service through the development of smarter and more efficient solutions based on cutting-edge technology and talented people. Wika Translate stands out for its multi-local approach to the market, a unique strategy that has made the group a preferred partner of many international clients. We are committed to revolutionizing language services and how they are rendered in nearly every industry and organization by enabling governments, schools and businesses to create, translate and deliver relevant and localized content to support our clients’ mission and vision. Our network of industry-expert translators and quality managers help to ensure that we deliver best-in-class work. Our technology simplifies the entire translation process, resulting in improved translation quality, expedited timelines, decreased workloads, and significant cost savings.

DESCRIPTION
A&A ATTORNEYS|AVOCATS is a pan-African Law Firm providing and advising on the issues that are critical to our clients by offering them tailored resources in one place so they can focus on their business.

As a single, fully integrated, global partnership, we pride ourselves on our approachable, collegial and team-based way of working.

We always strive to exceed the expectations of our clients, which include corporates from all the commercial and industrial sectors, the financial investor community, trade bodies and not-for-profit organizations.


We provide our clients with the highest-quality advice and legal insight with in-depth local expertise.

column314:
DESCRIPTION
EDUfinder Consultants Ltd. We provide sincere and professional services to students who wish to study abroad ( CHINA,UK,USA,CANADA,CYPRUS,TURKEY,POLAND, UKRAINE, SOUTH KOREA...).

Our primary responsibility is to provide information about study abroad. We try our best to meet the dream of studying abroad and provide quality & affordable education programs through scholarship applications among the best worldwide universities.

We help students get admissions,Scholarships,Visa application assistance , arrange accommodation and travel matters. Our greatest strength is how we help prepare students for a meaningful degree, and our company has prepared for every possible way to increase the student's future success.

Study abroad is very important but unfamiliar environment and the pressure to study competition will bring many difficulties . This is why our company guides students to their studies, provides them with detailed information on the countries where they wish to study which helps them in life and makes their study abroad an unforgettable experience.

column368:
DESCRIPTION
SYBYL (Previously Computer Point) Ltd is the leading Systems Integration and IT Solutions Company in East and Central Africa. For the last decade, we have successfully served the technology needs of more than 2500 customers from diverse industries and locations.
Our success and growth is keenly attributed to our ability to modulate the business challenges of our customers with cutting-edge technology solutions. The foundation of our service offerings is built upon the resilience of a solid partner network. Combinations of world leading vendors of technology products that enable us deliver world class, best-of-breed solutions to our customers. These include HPE, Microsoft, Cisco, Oracle, AVAYA, NetApp, IBM, EMC, VMware, APC, Tally Solutions, Fujitsu, Kaspersky, Red hat, Epson & Symantec etc. whom we represent as business partners.
We believe our strongest asset is our people - talented, enthusiastic and driven. Today, we have a team of over 200 committed people from different managerial and engineering backgrounds. Working in 5 countries, they use powerful technologies to provide Infrastructure, Enterprise Management as well as complete Business’s Automation Solutions and Services to the Enterprise market.

Our business edge directly relates to our investment in continuously scaling up our skills base, ensuring we deliver holistic solutions in close collaboration with vendors to ensure a quality deployment. We boast of employing the broadest consolidation of vendor technology accreditation like HPE Accredited System Engineers, NetApp Certified Systems Engineers, Oracle/Sun Certified Systems Engineers, Microsoft Certified Systems Engineers, Cisco Certified Network Professionals, VMware Certified Systems Engineers, Symantec Certified Systems Engineers, Certified Avaya Engineers, etc... Little wonder that we have innumerable cases of “first-to-market” technology deployments in East and Central Africa - be it, Campus-wide Wireless data networks, Multi-OS clustered Server environments or Storage Area Networks.
Finally, we recognize that business success in today’s economy is predicated on keeping costs in line while delivering timelier and better targeted, goods and services. Efficiency and productivity must prevail in an environment where rising costs cannot be passed on to the customer. This cause, in association with our focus on delivering all our services with the highest possible quality, drove us to implement and achieve the acclaimed ISO 9002 certifications from Nemko certification of the Dutch certification council, becoming the first IT Company in East and Central Africa to acquire this accreditation on a regional basis. This drives best business practices in our internal processes.

column402:
DESCRIPTION
NM_RTC) Ltd is a research consulting firm that also provides trainings and technical support to development workers and communities in areas of agricultural development, socio-economic development, and environmental and natural resources management. In NM_RTC Ltd, we use Computer Assisted Methods and ensure best quality by providing experienced teams and electronic equipment.
NM_RTC Ltd strives to develop and mobilize knowledge, expertise, and abilities to support sustainable development. We create high-impact knowledge to catalyze efficiency, effectiveness and accountability in private and public domains. We offer comprehensive research and consulting services to support business and policy decision making and analysis. We specialize in strategic planning and governance mechanisms for social, economic, and environmental monitoring and management. Our expertise extends beyond biophysical concerns to encompass social, cultural and economic dimensions of natural resource development and management. We emphasize practical results, quality services, and professional independence.

NM Research & Training Center (NM_RTC) Ltd is a company registered with the Rwanda Development Board (RDB) under Article 16 of Law No. 07/2009 of 27/04/2009 relating to companies in Rwanda as a Limited Company

column454:
DESCRIPTION
Planet Innovation ltd is a domestic company that sells electronics devices in Rwanda and all over the world,... founded in 2012 by Gashumba Jean Paul .registered in RDB in 2019

The Company
PLANET INNOVATION LTD was initiated in May 2012 in a dorm room with clear emphasis in software development, website designing, graphic designing, Network Installation, software/hardware supply, digital Marketing and consultations in
different fields utilizing Information Technology. In 2019 it was officially registered as a Limited company In RDB .Aims to provide quality orientated products and services to each and every client that it services.
The company’s youthful passion promises longevity in innovative service provision. PLANET INNOVATION LTD aims to provide technology based solutions to enterprises, government, and other private and public organizations within RWANDA and the rest of the world.
PLANET INNOVATION Ltd main office is located in KIGALI Rwanda opposite inkurunziza church kn76 Street Avenue de la Paix


Company Name:Planet innovation LTD
Physical Address:kigali Rwanda opposite inkurunziza church kn 76st
Phone Numbers:+250788302022/+250785619495
PLANET INNOVATION
KIGALI Rwanda
Postal Address
P.O.Box :0000Kigali
Products and services

 Software Development
 Web Designing and Development
 Website Hosting
 Email Hosting
 Network Design and Installation
 Computer Repairs and
Maintenance

Associations, Individuals, etc

Founder
Jean Paul Gashumba
Website:planetinnovationltd.com

Vision
To become a leader in providing best ICT innovative products and services in various industries.
To exceed the anticipation of our clients in service provision and product innovation so that customer satisfaction and retention is achieved. To overwhelmingly and optimistically influence the shape of Rwandan,s ICT services and beyond

DESCRIPTION OF OUR PRODUCTS AND SERVICES
PLANET INNOVATION LTD is one of the leading ICT Company that provides world class Information and Communication Technology (ICT) products and services to companies, individuals, organizations, institutions and many more. We have professionals who are innovative and creative in providing these classic ICT products and services in RWANDA and abroad.
Services that we offer
*Software Development
We develop software of your choice that your organization, company, institution might be in need of. We have professional staff in software development either standalone software or web based software to manage your day to day transactions and activities. we develop inventory systems, point of sale software, databases, Electronic Learning systems, student management systems just to mention a few.
*Web Designing
PLNET INNOVATION LTD systems is a company that develops world class websites for your company so that you can expose your brand to the world for wide recognition. We develop static as well as dynamic websites that you may be interested in to meet and suite your needs as our client.
*Network Installation
We install Local Area Networks (LAN) as well as Wide Area Networks (WAN) for different organizations, Institutions, companies or individuals. We provide 24 hour network support services to companies that we have installed our networks to make sure that the network they are using is up and running.
*Domain Name Registration
We Register website domains for companies or organizations who wish to have websites and expose their brand to the outside world.

*Computer Repair and maintenance
We Repair and maintain computers. When your computer has a hardware or software problem we provide repair services, cleaning the computer from viruses and installing necessary software for smooth running of your computer every day.
*Hardware, Software Supply and antivirus Installation

We supply different software that your company needs at any time like Anti viruses, Office Packages, Windows Operating systems, SAGE Line 50, Statistical Packages and many others your company needs anytime.
*Website Hosting and Email Hosting
We Provide website and email hosting services. We configure our emails so that they can be accessed anywhere around the world with high level security and other features which makes them easier to use.
*Training
We provide Training in different software that you need your employees to be trained in. Some of the software that we provide training include Joomla, Wordpress, Drupal for Website Design and Development, Software Development, Web Programming, Graphics Packages for example Adobe Photoshop and other programming languages for example PHP, CSSS, HTML
*Consultancy services
We provide ICT related consultancy services to companies’ individuals, Organizations, institutions and many more.

COMPETITIVE FACTORS

Competitive Strategic Domain
Our core business services spin around technology by definition we are ICT product and services providing company. Our aim is to be so focused on this specific I.C.T. area services which we deliver to you, through quality orientated, innovative and superior services.
Specialization: we have very well trained personnel in I.C.T who when put their

skills together put planet innovation on a competitive edge.
Quality: we would like to ensure we develop products that meet specific needs of our clients but also ensure that customers are satisfied, we have personnel abroad specifically to check whether our services meet international standards.

Professional: we ensure innovation in product and service provision so that our clients go with latest and up to date technology

Values are valuable, effective and efficient.

Jean Paul Gashumba– Chief Executive Officer(CEO) and founder of Planet innovation LTD

Has more than 10 years experience in ICT with a strong background in graphics designs, Cloud systems, Distributed systems, Data Centers, IT infrastructure, Software Development, Network, management and leadership. He has been the key personnel in many projects execution in Rwanda took part in the development of most of our products mentioned. He is innovative and creative.

column497:
DESCRIPTION
About Orient Chambers
Orient Chambers is a full-service law firm, registered and operating in the City of Kigali in the Republic of Rwanda. The firm offers a wide range of professional services to individuals, public institutions, private companies and civil society organisations (CSOs). The firm strives for excellence and aims to exceed clients’ expectations. It works hard to achieve its goals and it encourages its team to constantly retain its competitive edge through innovations.

Why Orient Chambers?
Orient Chambers is a law firm that you should choose because of the dedication, skills, knowledge, energy and selfless attitude of its team of legal experts, research professionals and consultants and other like-minded individuals it works with in the Eastern and Central African Region. The firm is committed to offering high-quality research, legal and consultancy services. It has excellent insights and in-depth knowledge of the local market. The firm invests significant resources in understanding the clients’ business and their strategic objectives to act in their best interests. This, combined with its dedication to professional integrity, forms the fundamental principles that define the firm’s strength and reputation in providing exceptional services. Our advantage is the unique mix of legal advisory services, alternative dispute resolution (ADR), litigation, consultancy services and research, all under one roof. This enables us to identify all potential challenges and risks and propose appropriate strategies for the clients’ business. We appreciate that our clients recognise and value our services as we continue to distinguish ourselves in restoring clients’ trust and confidence.

Our Core Values
The firm’s core values are honesty, integrity, professionalism, respect, accountability, commitment, independence, innovation and non-discrimination.

Business Areas
The core business areas of Orient Chambers Ltd are in three broad categories, namely:
 Legal services;
 Consultancy services; and
 Research.

column665:
DESCRIPTION
HERMOSA LIFE TOURS & TRAVEL LTD is an indigenous East African Rwandan tour operator organizing Gorilla trekking safaris & tours in Rwanda as well as wildlife safaris, fully registered and licensed in Kigali Rwanda. A percentage of our profits support the local community around parks.

Hermosa Life Tours & Travel Ltd offers Rwanda Safaris such as Gorilla tracking safaris and Chimpanzee Trekking, prime wild game tours, Mountain Climbing adventures, city tours, boat cruise trips, fishing trips, horseback riding, bird watching, Car hire and hotel booking. We run safaris in all the major Rwanda National Game Parks and Reserves such as Volcanoes national park, Akagera national park, Nyungwe forest National Park as well as all other prime safari destination in East Africa based on your interests.

column7:
DESCRIPTION
Stabit Advocates (SA) is the best Law Firm in Rwanda and one of the leading law firms in East Africa. We offer the best local and international expertise available both in practice and in the world bases on our international Stabit Advocates Firms/partners and– with the right level of relationships, insight and handy support staff.

Stabit Advocates is one of the growing Attorneys’ Firms and/or network throughout Africa. Hear from the Best Lawyers in Rwanda.

Through this network, the firm has two offices in Uganda and Rwanda but building capacity to expand in Kenya, Tanzania and the rest of Africa.

At Stabit Advocates, we are a full service law practicing firm and we provide all legal and related services both locally and abroad. Our lawyers are determined to provide the best services in their areas of expertise while developing their own skills and expertise. Our Main areas of practice include;

Corporate & Commercial transactions, Banking & Financial Law, Energy, Mining, Litigation and Arbitration, Consultancies and Business Development, Employment and Labour Law, Land Conveyance, Loans and Mortgages Documentation, Intellectual property rights, Environment and Land Law, Business Negotiation, Mediation and Conciliation among others.

column68:
DESCRIPTION
UZURI K&Y is an African inspired shoe brand and manufacturer established in Rwanda since 2013. The company was founded by two women entrepreneurs (Kevine & Ysolde) who met at University while studying Creative Designs. Furthermore, the two young women simply believed that it would ideal to gather knowledge and create a common mission. “We engaged in deep conversations, shared life perspectives and dreamed a lot of the future. It was incredible how our desires converged to be a common vision. We shared this passion for fashion and we wanted very much to create jobs for our community. Therefore, we thought of putting together our efforts to expand our ideas. We aim to go far,towards creating sustainable products and improve more people’s lives especially for women and youth.”

DESCRIPTION
Founded in 2017 in Kigali Rwanda, Hotelitoday.com is an international hotel booking site that was created with a mission to ease the hotel booking experience for every traveller through the provision of hotel accommodation across the globe with affordable, reliable and instant service

Hotelitoday.com provides travellers with unlimited choices of accommodation with competitive rates and services, ranging from hundreds of international hotel brands to thousands of self-catering establishments in the most remote parts of the world.

HoteliToday.com scans the market with competitive service standards that ensure value for money and unmatched privacy across the daily increasing number of online properties across the globe.


HotelToday.com is available in multiple languages designed to provide you with the best local experience from wherever you are.

HoteliToday.com Ltd. is a subsidiary of the Neza SAFARIS group of companies.HoteliToday.com Ltd headquarters are located at KN 70 St. Kigali Rwanda, The Neza SAFARIS Group has physical office locations across Africa and Europe

column82:
DESCRIPTION
Travel Abroad Solution and Services ltd, is tourism company set at the heart of Kigali aims to provide comprehensive travel services to our esteemed clients on timely manner with honest and integrity.

OUR TEAM:

Our team presents affordable and the best trip proposals to our clients for their quality healthy treatment and study from overseas institutions and East African tour arrangements.

OUR VISION:

TASS Ltd our Vision is to become the principal in tourism by reaching undiscovered areas, connecting unconnected and making travelers journey Seamless & positive.

OUR MISSION:

Travel Abroad Solution and Services aims to provide quick and affordable access to clinics, hospitals, universities, and travel services to our clients.

OUR VALUES:

Customer Service: we focus on taking good care of our clients, listening to their needs and providing solutions to fit their budget in a timely manner.

Integrity: we value our customers and partners and our first priority is to operate with honest integrity.


Team Work: We believe in working together with our employees and partners to provide the best solutions for our clients.

OUR SERVICES:

Study Abroad:

· Connect students in Africa with colleges and universities abroad

· Guidance through the application and admission process


· Connect students with other East Africans studying in the same area

· Guidance in the visa application process

Medical Tourism:

· Apply patient invitations at hospitals abroad

· Access cost from a variety of clinics and hospitals

· Arrange transportation and hotel-stay

Tourism in East Africa:

· Book flights & Ticketing

· Arrange hotel reservations and transport

· Organize cultural and wildlife tours

TASS Being a one stop center of all travel management service, we wish to extend our expression of interest in serving institutions whose interest are the exceptional services and on timely manner

column517:
DESCRIPTION
Choose Kigali was founded by a world renowned artist Emmanuel Nkuranga in 2019 . Located in Kiyovu, the historic heart of the city, Choose Kigali is at its core a creative space. This space includes several floors of open gallery that feature a rotating slate of Africa’s latest contemporary art.

Choose Kigali allows for a wider range of artists to show their work, in a greater range of formats. The gallery and tiered gardens are built for an ideal event space. With few bespoke events spaces in the city, Choose Kigali is the ideal location for a private event—whether a lunch of 10, or a reception of 200.

column635:
DESCRIPTION
Perkins Generator Technology manufactures an unbeatable range of power solutions, powered by PERKINS as one of the top players in GCC and Africa in the power generator set market. Our diesel product range, available from 9 – 2250 KVA, includes open and enclosed generator sets, which offer outstanding value for money, guaranteeing maximum efficiency and productivity. We are proud to be one of Perkins Original Equipment Manufacturers (OEM)."
column638:
DESCRIPTION
Legal Professional Translation Ltd is a company registered in Rwanda since 2017, it was born in neighboring Country Burundi in 2013. It has already performed many translation tasks and in different domain of the life. In Burundi, I workrd with law firms, NGOs, Public and Private instittions, local and international Companies.
From July 2015 it is located in Kigali, it worked as an informal company and decided to register as formal company in 2017. Today It was working with different associations; NGOs; individual etc. There is expectation to cooperate with other translation companies in Kigali.

column8:
PRODUCTS & SERVICES
Remarkable Rwanda Getaway
You are not far away from achieving your unforgettable and once-in-a-lifetime experience safari on this Rwanda safari. You will be introduced to the 'big five' on the majestic plains of Akagera Nation...
TWO DAYS GORILLA TREKKING IN RWANDA
Two Days Gorilla Trekking in Rwanda gives you a chance to track the endangered mountain gorillas in Volcanoes National Park, in the northeastern part of Rwanda. This Safari is ideal for guests/visitors with busy schedules and would love to do something fun and memorable.
PRICE: 750 USD
One Day Akagera National Park Game Drive
Akagera National Park has a diversity of wildlife including buffaloes, elephants, giraffes, zebras, impalas and many others. After a long time being extinct in Akagera National Park, the black rhinos and lions have recently been restocked.
PRICE: 250 USD

column72:
PRODUCTS & SERVICES
Website Design & Development
Web design and development is an umbrella term that describes the process of creating a website. Like the name suggests, it involves two major skill sets: web design and web development. Web design determines the look and feel of a website, while web development determines how it functions.
PRICE: 200,000 Rwf
Mobile Apps Development
Best in class, well-structured iOS, and Android App Development backed with cutting-edge technology embellishing Modern Technology UX.
PRICE: 400,000 Rwf
Digital Marketing
It's also called online marketing, is the promotion of brands to connect with potential customers using the internet and other forms of digital communication. This includes not only email, social media, and web-based advertising, but also text and multimedia messages as a marketing channel.
PRICE: 300,000 Rwf
